text: mariyu varilo okadu, maranam asannamayye varaku papakaryalu cestu vundi: "Ippudu nenu pascattapa padutunnanu!" Ani ante alanti vari pascattapam mariyu maranince varaku satyatiraskaruluga unnavari (pascattapam) svikarincabadavu. Alanti vari koraku memu badhakaramaina siksanu sid'dhaparaci uncamu
